Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: Due to bandits and other unwholesome peoples, this part of the road is poorly maintained. The trees are getting thicker along here.
Room.LongDescription: the trees are on both sides of the wide road, but you can see where the trees abruptly end and the great desert begins on the other side of a very large outcropping of rock a little way to the south. There is a gulley across the road, which should be repaired.
